entities.name: death
entities.description: Death is introduced as a character who has been evaded by the three brothers. He is described as cunning.

entities.name: the oldest brother
entities.description: The oldest brother is introduced as a combative man who asks for a wand more powerful than any in existence.

entities.name: the elder tree
entities.description: The elder tree is mentioned as the source of the branch from which Death fashioned the wand.

entities.name: the river
entities.description: The river is mentioned as the location where the three brothers usually drowned and where Death crossed to fashion the wand.

relationships.description: Death gave a wand to the oldest brother, who had asked for it.
Death crossed to an elder tree on the banks of the river to fashion the wand.
Death was on the banks of the river when he fashioned the wand.
